H3.text: when was the immigration act passed in canada. 1923

A4.text: The Chinese Immigration Act, 1923 was passed by the government of Liberal Prime Minister William Lyon Mackenzie King.

A5.text: The Chinese Immigration Act went into effect on 1 July 1923.
